t: Amazon launches two furniture brands of its own - Curbed
s: November 7, 2017 - The company just launched two in-house furniture brands: Rivet, a midcentury modern line aimed at millennials (think smaller sofas with removable backs aimed at nomadic millennials in small urban apartments), and Stone & Beam, a country-modern brand targeting families at a higher price point.
